data.pricing_trends: Prices typically rise during the peak tourist months of November to February. Expect lower rates during the rainy season.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 3-5 months in advance for the best rates and availability.
data.demand: Growing interest in sustainable and cultural tourism drives demand for trips to Guatemala.
data.competition: Similar destinations include Mexico and Costa Rica, but Guatemala offers unique cultural experiences that set it apart.
